p.s:
Kyoto Tycoon client library for PHP.
*System requirement. -PHP5.3 -HTTP_Request2 -PHPUnit3.5
*Usage >|| <?php require_once 'Net/KyotoTycoon.php'; $kt = new \Net\KyotoTycoon(array('port' => 19780)); $kt->set('test_php', 'Hello KyotoTycoon!!'); var_dump($kt->get('test_php')); // Hello KyotoTYcoon!! ||<
